snippet: The incoming president of the European Union’s executive branch, in nominating a new cabinet of commissioners, aims to appease a disenchanted public.
abstract: Jean-Claude Juncker, incoming president of European Commission, European Union's executive branch, nominates slate of new commissioners, but also reduces their autonomy by adding layer of oversight; Juncker's nominal goal is to streamline operations, but whether he is streamlining them or making them even more complex remains to be seen.
lead_paragraph: The incoming president of the European Union’s executive branch, in nominating a new cabinet of commissioners, aims to appease a disenchanted public.

headline.main: Jean-Claude Juncker Seeks to Streamline Brussels Bureaucracy
headline.print_headline: Seeking to Streamline the Bureaucracy of Europe’s Executive Branch
